en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Europe

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, will visit France, Luxembourg, the Netherlands and Austria from April 11 to 18.

Ms Cheng will depart for Paris, France, in the early hours on April 11. During her stay in Paris, Luxembourg, The Hague and Vienna, she will attend a number of events to promote Hong Kong's legal and dispute resolution services. She will also call on various courts, government departments, international organisations and more. Ms Cheng will conclude her visit in Vienna, Austria, on April 18.
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師四月十一日至十八日訪問法國、盧森堡、荷蘭及奧地利。
鄭若驊四月十一日凌晨啟程前往法國巴黎。在逗留巴黎、盧森堡、海牙及維也納期間，鄭若驊會出席不同的活動推廣香港的法律及爭議解決服務。她亦會拜訪多個法院、政府部門及國際組織等。鄭若驊會於四月十八日在奧地利維也納結束行程。

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, will visit France, Luxembourg, the Netherlands and Austria from April 11 to 18.
Ms Cheng will depart for Paris, France, in the early hours on April 11
During her stay in Paris, Luxembourg, The Hague and Vienna, she will attend a number of events to promote Hong Kong's legal and dispute resolution services
She will also call on various courts, government departments, international organisations and more
Ms Cheng will conclude her visit in Vienna, Austria, on April 18.

鄭若驊四月十一日凌晨啟程前往法國巴黎
在逗留巴黎、盧森堡、海牙及維也納期間，鄭若驊會出席不同的活動推廣香港的法律及爭議解決服務
她亦會拜訪多個法院、政府部門及國際組織等
鄭若驊會於四月十八日在奧地利維也納結束行程
